**Qualifications**:

- Ph.D. in diabetes epidemiology and health economics
  - Studied the use of antidiabetic drugs and their utilisation in Denmark, and economic model assumptions used in their comparisons in cost-effectiveness analyses using decision analytical models
  - Two observational studies
  - [Published review](https://doi.org/10.1007/s40273-023-01268-5) of economic model assumptions when comparing newer medications for treating type 2 diabetes
  - Data sources: registry data from [The Register of Pharmaceutical Sales](https://english.sundhedsdatastyrelsen.dk/health-data-and-registers/national-health-registers#) and [The National Patient Register](https://english.sundhedsdatastyrelsen.dk/health-data-and-registers/national-health-registers#)
- Worked as a scientific assistant
  - [Published review](https://doi.org/10.1186/s12913-019-4482-6) of PDSA frameworks as used in the real world
